name: Giveaways
description: Host Giveaways for your server with features and requirements!
end_user_data_statement: This cog will store your servers giveaways
install_msg: Check out `[p]gset]` to set your settings. If you reload this cog, it has a restart logic, sadly, reloads also trigger this, resulting in more of the tasks, so after 4 or so reloads you should restart the bot to make sure 5 giveaway messages dont flood
author: Andy
